title.rendered: LAWS Alumni Joseph Viscomi Headed to Law School at U of T

content.rendered:
LAWS would like to congratulate Joseph Viscomi on his acceptance to the U of T Faculty of Law. Joseph will be the second LAWS graduate to attend law school. After graduating from Central Technical School in 2011, Joseph began an undergraduate degree at the University of Toronto, which he is currently completing. Joseph stayed connected with LAWS throughout his undergrad, and took part in the LSAT Prep Program offered to LAWS alumni by the University of Toronto. 

Congratulations, Joseph, and best of luck at U of T Law!
